2. Cbind models for all salamander spp.
   a. T0 (At time of observation)
```{r}
dcbind_alpestris <- tidyr::drop_na(dcbind_alpestris, any_of(c(14:15, 29:34)))


# Functions to scale & unscale data:
scale_data <- function(data_in, ...){
  scaled <- data_in 
    for(i in list(...)){
      # store scaled data in object
      x <- scale(data_in[i])
      # change col name of scaled data to match fun. input
      colnames(x) <- paste0(as.character(...))
      x2 <- paste(x)
      # overwrite col. in output with scaled data
      scaled[i] <- x2
    
  }
  scaledData <- data.frame(scaled)
  return(scaledData)
  
}

get_scale_attributes <- function(data_in, ...){
    for(i in list(...)){
      varList <- list(as.character(...)) 
      vars <- do.call(rbind.data.frame, varList)
      x <- scale(data_in[i])
      # Save scaled attributes for later use
      s <- attr(x,"scaled:scale")
      c <- attr(x, "scaled:center")
    }       
  attr_df <- data.frame(variable = as.character(vars),
                          scale = as.numeric(s),
                          center = as.numeric(c))
  
  return(attr_df)
}
  
unscale_data <- function(data_in, scaled_pred, scale, center, ...){
  unscaled_pred <- scaled_pred
  for(i in list(...)){
    vector1_of_values %in% vector2_of_values
    unscaled_pred[i] <- scaled_pred[i] * scale[i] + center[i]
    
  }
  unscaledData <- data.frame(unscaled_pred)
  return(unscaledData)
}    

varNames <- c("temp_date", "temp_date_t1", "temp_date_t2",
              "soilMoisture_date", "soilMoisture_date_t1", "soilMoisture_date_t2")
  
scaledData <- scale_data(dcbind_alpestris, varNames)
scaledData_attr <- get_scale_attributes(dcbind_alpestris, varNames)
unscaledData <- unscale_data()

m3a_scaled <- glmmTMB(cbind(YesBsal, NoBsal) ~  logsiteAbun*richness + temp_date*soilMoisture_date + (1|scientific),
               data = scaledData, family = "binomial",
               control = glmmTMBControl(optimizer = optim, 
                                        optArgs = list(method = "BFGS")))
# Predictions on scaled data:

# Fit the same model to the original  data:
```

```{r}
# Copy dataframe
scaledData <- dcbind_alpestris
# Scale variables:
scaledData$temp_date <- scale(scaledData$temp_date)
scaledData$soilMoisture_date <- scale(scaledData$soilMoisture_date)

# Save scaled attributes:
scaleList <- scaledData %>%
  list(temp_scale = as.numeric(attr(scaledData$temp_date, "scaled:scale")),
    temp_center = as.numeric(attr(scaledData$temp_date, "scaled:center")),
    soilMoisture_scale = as.numeric(attr(scaledData$soilMoisture_date, "scaled:scale")),
    soilMoisture_center = as.numeric(attr(scaledData$soilMoisture_date, "scaled:center")))


# Convert scaled prediction to original data scale:
usp <- sp
usp$temp_date <- sp$temp_date * scaleList$temp_scale + scaleList$temp_center 
usp$soilMoisture_date <- sp$soilMoisture * scaleList$soilMoisture_scale + scaleList$soilMoisture_center


# Compare predictions:
all.equal(op, usp)
```
